title: kiss - Buenos Aires,Argentina 1997-03-14 SOUNDBOARD
description:
KISS 
River Plate Stadium
Buenos Aires
Argentina
March 14th 1997
Reunion Tour
FM Broadcast
Partial show
Running time: 95 min
Sound quality: A+

Here's the most complete version I was able to put together of the FM audio from the concert in Buenos Aires 1997. I composed it with the original broadcast from 1997 and a partial re-broadcast from last year. That allowed me to get rid of many parts (not all) where the DJs were talking. There are 2 audience recordings of this show, but none of them sound good enough. Anyway, I took the solo of Gene from one of that audience recordings to fix some missing part before and during the intro of "God Of Thunder". The songs that remain missing with good quality are Deuce", "King Of The Night Time World" and "Black Diamond" (including "La Bamba" during the intro). But I added the 4 radio promos at the end of the show.

To come up with this audio I used 3 sources: my own old 90 min tape, the audio Eltiburon taped in 1997 and also the new broadcast taped by Leomet2000. 

I want to thank Eltiburon and Leomet2000 for their kind help!

CD 1:
01-Let me go rock and roll
02-Do you love me
03-Firehouse
04-Watching you
05-Shock me
06-Ace's solo
07-Calling dr. love
08-Shout it out loud
09-I was made for lovin' you
10-Cold gin
11-C'mon and love me

CD 2:
01-Love gun
02-Gene's solo (aud)
03-God of thunder
04-Peter's solo
05-2000 man
06-100000 years
07-Detroit rock city
08-Beth
09-Rock and roll all nite
10-Radio promo 1
11-Radio promo 2
12-Radio promo 3
13-Radio promo 4

In the meantime, Let's keep this as an exclusive of this site. 
Please don't upload it at other sites and don't convert it to any lossy format
